text: A heptagon, also referred to as a septagon or 7-gon is a shape with 7 sides and 7 corners. == Regular heptagon == All sides of a regular heptagon are the same length. Each corner is about 147.27°. All corners added together are about equal to 6840°. === Area === The amount of space a regular heptagon takes up is :A = \frac{7}{4}a^2 \cot \frac{\pi}{7} \simeq 3.634 a^2. a is the length of one of its sides. 7
title: Heptagon
